GisEnvelopeImpl Class Reference

#include <EnvelopeImpl.h>

Inherits GisIEnvelope.

Inheritance diagram for GisEnvelopeImpl:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The GisEnvelopeImpl class is a default implementation of GisIEnvelope. GisEnvelopeImpl implements accessors from GisIEnvelope, matching mutators, and simple data members. Assignment, exact equality operators, and utility methods are also provided.

Definition at line 33 of file EnvelopeImpl.h.
